name: Mark Perticone
coverLetter:
Hi, my name is Mark Perticone and I want to trim bud. I have experience trimming wet and dry, work in a timely manner, I work well with others and can take constructive criticism. My responsible manner will show up on time and get the job done as needed. I do have my OLCC handlers permit, my only down-fall is I need to use public transportation to arrive on the jobsite or if you have camping available I can show up almost anyplace you would need me. I am eager to get started so please contact me anytime.
 
 
                                                                                                                  Thank You,
                                                                                                                  Mark Perticone
